item.description:
With 18" of new snow Wednesday and more on the way, conditions should be great at Windblown this Saturday.

We meet at 10 AM, just outside the lodge. Arrive early so you can buy your trail pass and get ready to ski before we meet. Allow at least 1.5 hours driving time from the Boston area.

Trail passes are $16--cash or check only.
Rentals available

Lunch at the lodge--Bring your own, or buy at the lodge.

See you Saturday morning!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a black ball cap

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Ski Windblown Saturday!
